#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{int a,b;
scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
char c[a+1];
char d[b+1];
scanf("%s",&c);
scanf("%s",&d);
int max=0,l,k,i,count,j;
 
for(i=0;i<a;i++)
 for(j=0;j<=b && k<=a;j++)
 {k=i;l=j;
 count=0;
 while(c[k]==d[l])  //compare till equal
  {
     ++k;
     ++l;
   ++count;   //keep counting
  }
  
   if(count>max)     
    max=count;  
  }
 
printf("%d",max);
 
return 0;}
